Name: RagDoll MadDoll
About the game: Shoot, drop and score. RagDoll MadDoll is a modern twist on classic arcade games implementing simple controls and showcasing diverse art direction. Using a sliding cannon, shoot down a ragdoll that physically interacts with obstacles, traps and slides within the level itself. Score zones add up points in the same level session as soon as you hit the bottom of the level. Enjoy the jazz music while your ragdoll takes its twists and turns to the score zone. Levels and features include: Classic - Traditional slides and bumpers Long - Rotating traps and slides Traps - Explosives, saws and rotating traps Narrow - Choke point and rotating traps Teleports - Bumpers and teleports Tubes - Slides/tubes and rotating traps Neon - Neon themed bumpers, rotating traps and teleports Cubic - Flat themed bumpers and rotating traps PC, Mac and Linux support included.
Meta Title: RagDoll MadDoll: Oct 19, 2020, Team Booky and Full Overview
